meanings.definition: A store selling cold cuts, cheeses, and a variety of salads and sandwiches.
meanings.sent1: I went to the delicatessens to buy some ham and cheese for my sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The delicatessens in our neighborhood always has fresh salads and tasty sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: At the delicatessens, the cheese and ham were having a dance party in the fridge!
meanings.sent4: The delicatessens is a treasure trove of flavors waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the delicatessens lingered in the air, tempting me with its delicious offerings.

meanings.definition: A section in a grocery store or supermarket that sells prepared foods.
meanings.sent1: I always stop by the delicatessens in the supermarket to grab a quick lunch.
meanings.sent2: The delicatessens at the grocery store has a great selection of ready-to-eat meals.
meanings.sent3: The delicatessens aisle in the supermarket felt like a magical food wonderland.
meanings.sent4: In the hustle and bustle of the supermarket, the delicatessens stood out like a beacon of convenience.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the delicatessens section beckoned hungry shoppers with promises of delicious treats.
